title: Whoâ€™s REALLY the Most Extreme Political Group? | 5/5/22
description:
Glenn theorizes he's fallen through a wormhole into a parallel universe, as the Democrats keep flip-flopping on their stances and seem confused about who the most radical political group in American history is. Glenn and Stu compare and contrast Glenn's old universe, as Glenn takes calls from listeners. Glenn discusses the oddity that France is more extreme in its abortion restrictions than a lot of America. A listener calls in regarding Dinesh D'Souza's latest film, and Glenn shares his thoughts. Glenn discusses Levi's clothes company paying for its employees' travel to get an abortion. Glenn answered a listener's question and launched into the radicalization of the state of Utah. Glenn and Stu taste test a plant-based filet mignon.
